Sentencas: To improve the efficiency of the diffusivity measurement in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), a bi-sensor electrochemical cell is proposed and analyzed.
Titulo: Doubling the diffusivity measurement efficiency in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) via a bi-sensor electrochemical cell

Sentencas: The cell consists of an oxygen pump and two oxygen sensors.
Titulo: Doubling the diffusivity measurement efficiency in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) via a bi-sensor electrochemical cell

Sentencas: This bi-sensor cell doubles the efficiency of binary diffusivity measurements in both porous anodes and cathodes in SOFCs.
Titulo: Doubling the diffusivity measurement efficiency in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) via a bi-sensor electrochemical cell

Sentencas: The design provides an efficient platform to estimate the electrode limiting current density (LCD) and concentration polarization (CP) in SOFCs.
Titulo: Doubling the diffusivity measurement efficiency in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) via a bi-sensor electrochemical cell

Sentencas: Mechanism of measuring the CP with different electrode configurations was discussed in depth.
Titulo: Doubling the diffusivity measurement efficiency in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) via a bi-sensor electrochemical cell

Sentencas: The design was verified by studying the effect of electrode thickness on the CPs at different operating temperatures.
Titulo: Doubling the diffusivity measurement efficiency in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) via a bi-sensor electrochemical cell
Doubling the diffusivity measurement efficiency in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) via a bi-sensor electrochemical cell
